name: poom-bot
description: Poom, lets you set up pomodoro timers with customizable intervals and rewards.

scripts.start: npm run clean-log:win && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/Bot.ts dev
scripts.deploy: npm run clean-log:unix && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/Bot.ts prod
scripts.dev: npm run clean-log:win && nodemon --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/Bot.ts dev

author: asror
